metadata.reset:
Z-Wave Factory reset procedure
The 2KLIC controller has an option to factory reset which allows the system to return back to its default settings, the steps are given below:

From the home page, click on the property
Click the System status icon in the left menu
Click the Smart controller card, which is the first card visible, to edit the smart controller settings
Go to the Manage Z-Wave tab 
Open the Advanced options
Find the Reset card
Click on the Reset button to start
Click on the text input and type 'Confirm' in the box below
Then click on the Confirm button
You will see "The controller is resetting. Please wait. It could take up to 1 minute." message
And then you will see "The controller has been reset", as soon as it is done resetting
Now you have to start adding new devices to your controller and take all the necessary steps to get your system up and running.

Resetting this controller will leave your Z-Wave devices orphaned in the network. Please remove all Z-Wave devices before performing this reset procedure. If this controller is a part of another Z-Wave network, please use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
